item.title: Hello
item.description: Hi! This is supposed to be the first of (hopefully) many posts to come. I’ve been putting off starting a blog for a long time - Google Keep/Joplin isn’t the best place to document technical learnings. With this, I hope to organize and reflect on whatever I learn during my development journey that I feel is worth documenting. Maybe throw in some rants as well. Just use Medium? I intended to start writing on Medium initially until it occurred to me that it wouldn’t allow me to customize my blog.
